xwikidoc.content: admin.image.style=Image Styles image.style.admin.heading=Image Style Administration image.style.administration.imageStyleList.heading=Image Styles image.style.administation.newImageStyle.button=Create the image style image.style.administation.defaultImageStyle.button=Update the default image style image.style.imageStyleSheet.backToAdministration.link=Back to the administration image.style.administration.liveData.doc.title=Identifier image.style.administration.liveData._actions=Actions image.style.administration.liveData.prettyName=Pretty Name image.style.administration.liveData.prettyName.hint=User oriented name of the image style image.style.administration.liveData.type=Type image.style.administration.liveData.type.hint=The type of the image style (used as a css class) image.style.administration.liveData.emptyvalue= image.style.administation.newImageStyle.label=New Image Style image.style.administation.newImageStyle.hint=Identifier of the new image style. image.style.administation.newImageStyle.placeHolder=Identifier image.style.administation.newImageStyle.normalizedTitle=The new image style, following the naming conventions is [{0}]. Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_adjustableAlignment=Adjustable Alignment Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_adjustableAlignment_hint=When checked, the user is allowed to customize the aligment of the image. Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_adjustableBorder=Adjustable Border Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_adjustableBorder_hint=When checked, the user is allowed to customize the border of the image. Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_adjustableSize=Adjustable Size Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_adjustableSize_hint=When checked, the user is allowed to customize the size of the image. Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_adjustableTextWrap=Adjustable Text Wrap Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_adjustableTextWrap_hint=When checked, the user is allowed to customize the text wrap of the image. Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultAlignment=Default Alignment Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultAlignment_center=Center Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultAlignment_default= Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultAlignment_hint=The default alignment of the image. Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultAlignment_none=None Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultAlignment_start=Start Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultAlignment_center=Center Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultAlignment_end=End Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultBorder=Default Border Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultBorder_hint=When checked, the image has a border by default. Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultHeight=Default height Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultHeight_hint=The default height of the image. If the default width is left empty, it will be computed according to the image ratio. Otherwise, the image will have a fixed size. Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultTextWrap=Default Text Wrap Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultTextWrap_hint=When checked, the text will wrap around the image by default. Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultWidth=Default Width Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultWidth_hint=The default width of the image. If the default height is left empty, it will be computed according to the image ratio. Otherwise, the image will have a fixed size. Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_prettyName=Pretty Name Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_prettyName_hint=User oriented name of the image style. Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_type=Type Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_type_hint=The type of the image style (used as a css class). Image.Style.Code.ConfigurationClass_defaultStyle=Default Style Image.Style.Code.ConfigurationClass_defaultStyle_hint=The default image style for this wiki. Image.Style.Code.ConfigurationClass_forceDefaultStyle=Force Default Style Image.Style.Code.ConfigurationClass_forceDefaultStyle_hint=When checked, the constraints of the default style are forced in the image configuration, and users are forced to choose a style.
